hero.description: Transform your photos into stunning artwork with AI-powered style transfer. Upload, choose a style, and watch AI work its magic in seconds.

benefits.subtitle: Why Choose FluxTools
benefits.title: AI-Powered Style Transfer
benefits.description: Experience the future of photo editing with our advanced AI technology. Transform any image into stunning artwork in seconds.

items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: Transform your photos in just 10-15 seconds. No waiting, no complex setup - just instant AI magic.

items.title: Professional Quality
items.description: Get high-resolution, professional-grade results that preserve your original image's essence while adding stunning artistic flair.

items.title: Simple & Easy
items.description: Just upload, select a style, and download. No technical skills required - anyone can create beautiful art.

items.title: Multiple Styles
items.description: Choose from anime, oil painting, watercolor, cyberpunk and more artistic styles to match your creative vision.

features.subtitle: How It Works
features.title: Simple 3-Step Process
features.description: Transform your photos into stunning artwork with our intuitive AI-powered platform. No technical expertise required - just creativity.

items.title: Upload Your Photo
items.description: Simply drag and drop or click to upload your image. Supports JPG, PNG, and WEBP formats up to 10MB.

items.title: Choose Art Style
items.description: Select from our collection of artistic styles including anime, oil painting, watercolor, and cyberpunk.

items.title: AI Processing
items.description: Our advanced AI algorithms analyze your image and apply the selected style while preserving important details.

items.title: High-Quality Output
items.description: Get professional-grade results in high resolution, ready for social media, printing, or professional use.

items.title: Download & Share
items.description: Download your transformed artwork instantly or share directly to social media platforms.

items.title: Batch Processing
items.description: Process multiple images at once with our batch feature. Perfect for large projects and professional workflows.

services.subtitle: Art Styles
services.title: Choose Your Style
services.description: Explore our curated collection of artistic styles. From classic art movements to modern digital aesthetics, find the perfect style for your vision.

items.title: Anime Style
items.description: Transform your photos into beautiful anime artwork with vibrant colors and distinctive character aesthetics.

items.title: Oil Painting
items.description: Create classic oil painting effects with rich textures and masterful brushwork reminiscent of Renaissance art.

items.title: Watercolor
items.description: Achieve delicate watercolor paintings with soft, flowing colors and artistic transparency effects.

items.title: Cyberpunk
items.description: Transform images into futuristic cyberpunk art with neon colors, digital glitch effects, and sci-fi aesthetics.

items.question: What is FluxTools?
items.answer: FluxTools is an AI-powered image style transfer tool that transforms your photos into stunning artwork using various artistic styles like anime, oil painting, watercolor, and cyberpunk.

items.question: What image formats are supported?
items.answer: FluxTools supports JPG, PNG, and WEBP formats. Images can be up to 10MB in size. We recommend high-resolution images for the best transformation results.

items.question: How long does it take to transform an image?
items.answer: Most transformations are completed in 10-15 seconds. Processing time may vary slightly depending on image size and complexity, but you'll always get fast, professional results.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no long-term commitments or cancellation fees. Your plan remains active until the end of your current billing period.

items.question: Is there a free trial available?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a free trial with our Starter plan so you can experience FluxTools before committing. No credit card required to start your trial.

brand.description: Transform your photos into stunning artwork with AI-powered style transfer. Experience the future of creative photo editing.
